name: Treasure Arena (Malgios)
description:
Fight for treasures. Each treasure you posses makes you stronger. Trade them with a merchant to get strong enough to beat the champion in the arena.

The game is played with a mouse. Right click can be used to split stacks of treasures.

Download for the best experience.

A game for the Below the Stone Jam

Strength Of The Titans by Kevin MacLeod
